title: unifyfs fails to build, unknown type 'MPI_Fint'
body:
Package `unifyfs` fails to build on Ubuntu 18.04, x86_64 with Spack develop (e3b357ad87). The full spack-build-log is attached, but the error is shown below. I've tried with both `mpich` and `openmpi` -- same error either way.

Full build log: [unifyfs-build-out.txt](https://github.com/spack/spack/files/4276893/unifyfs-build-out.txt)

**Error:**
```
make[3]: Entering directory '/tmp/walker/spack-stage/spack-stage-unifyfs-0.9.0-yqx3hsbr465azvv6lwnq7q5vp7r5st3p/spack-src/spack-build/client/src'
  CC       libunifyfs_la-margo_client.lo
  CC       libunifyfs_la-unifyfs.lo
  CC       libunifyfs_la-unifyfs-dirops.lo
  CC       libunifyfs_la-unifyfs-fixed.lo
  CC       libunifyfs_la-unifyfs-stack.lo
  CC       libunifyfs_la-unifyfs-stdio.lo
  CC       libunifyfs_la-unifyfs-sysio.lo
  CC       libunifyfs_la-pmpi_wrappers.lo
In file included from /tmp/walker/spack-stage/spack-stage-unifyfs-0.9.0-yqx3hsbr465azvv6lwnq7q5vp7r5st3p/spack-src/client/src/pmpi_wrappers.c:15:0:
/tmp/walker/spack-stage/spack-stage-unifyfs-0.9.0-yqx3hsbr465azvv6lwnq7q5vp7r5st3p/spack-src/client/src/pmpi_wrappers.h:21:16: error: unknown type name 'MPI_Fint'
 void mpi_init_(MPI_Fint* ierr);
                ^~~~~~~~
/tmp/walker/spack-stage/spack-stage-unifyfs-0.9.0-yqx3hsbr465azvv6lwnq7q5vp7r5st3p/spack-src/client/src/pmpi_wrappers.h:26:20: error: unknown type name 'MPI_Fint'
 void mpi_finalize_(MPI_Fint* ierr);
                    ^~~~~~~~
Makefile:646: recipe for target 'libunifyfs_la-pmpi_wrappers.lo' failed
make[3]: *** [libunifyfs_la-pmpi_wrappers.lo] Error 1
make[3]: Leaving directory '/tmp/walker/spack-stage/spack-stage-unifyfs-0.9.0-yqx3hsbr465azvv6lwnq7q5vp7r5st3p/spack-src/spack-build/client/src'
Makefile:460: recipe for target 'all-recursive' failed
make[2]: *** [all-recursive] Error 1
make[2]: Leaving directory '/tmp/walker/spack-stage/spack-stage-unifyfs-0.9.0-yqx3hsbr465azvv6lwnq7q5vp7r5st3p/spack-src/spack-build/client'
Makefile:490: recipe for target 'all-recursive' failed
make[1]: *** [all-recursive] Error 1
make[1]: Leaving directory '/tmp/walker/spack-stage/spack-stage-unifyfs-0.9.0-yqx3hsbr465azvv6lwnq7q5vp7r5st3p/spack-src/spack-build'
Makefile:400: recipe for target 'all' failed
make: *** [all] Error 2
```

@CamStan
